import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" import Rating from "../components/Rating" import Message from "../components/Message" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import { listProductDetails } from "../actions/productActions" const ProductScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( <> Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map( (x) => ( ) )} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
